text: Samsonov is the first goalie off the ice this morning. #Caps
Ilya Samsonov is the first goaltender off the ice at morning skate. He looks like the Capitals' starter against the Islanders tonight.
Laviolette confirmed Ilya Samsonov will start in net for Capitals tonight vs. Islanders.
